abstract: Driven column review of 2016 Mazda CX-9.

headline.print_headline: A Three-Row Crossover  That’s a Treat for Parents
headline.main: Mazda’s CX-9: A Crossover That’s a Treat for Parents

snippet: Mazda has updated the CX-9 with aggressive styling and a turbocharged 4-cylinder engine with more torque than the 6-cylinder it replaced.
lead_paragraph: Mazda has updated the CX-9 with aggressive styling and a turbocharged 4-cylinder engine with more torque than the 6-cylinder it replaced.
